actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to increase the amount a State may set aside for low-cost weatherization under the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981.

summary.text: Amends the Low-Income Energy Assistance Act of 1981 to increase the amount of funds which a State may set aside for low-cost residential weatherization or other energy-related home repair for low-income households.

titles.title: A bill to increase the amount a State may set aside for low-cost weatherization under the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981.
